feed.title: Breathe
feed.subtitle: A simple Jekyll site to explore and hack on

entry.title: Nadi Shodhana
entry.content: Sit comfortably with the spine straight. With vishnu mudra block the right nostril. Inhale through the left nostril to the count of 4. Close both nostrils and retain the breath for the count of 16. Open the right nostril and exhale to the count of 8. Alternate nostrils for four complete cycles.
entry.summary: Sit comfortably with the spine straight. With vishnu mudra block the right nostril. Inhale through the left nostril to the count of 4. Close both nostrils and retain the breath for the count of 16. Open the right nostril and exhale to the count of 8. Alternate nostrils for four complete cycles.
